metadata.description: Fully automated deployment of Group Tree Membership Visualizer - Downloads pre-built files from storage and deploys automatically.
metadata.author: Ofir Gavish

metadata.description: Name of the Static Web App. Must be globally unique.
Azure region for the Static Web App.
Pricing tier. Free tier supports up to 100 requests/day.
Version of the application to deploy. Use 'latest' for the most recent version.
Storage account name where pre-built files are stored.
Custom domain for the storage account (optional).

properties.scriptContent:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

echo "üå≥ Starting automated deployment for $STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME"
echo "üì¶ Primary Download URL: $DOWNLOAD_URL"
echo "üè† Resource Group: $RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME"
echo "üåç Subscription: $SUBSCRIPTION_ID"

# Create temporary directory
TEMP_DIR=$(mktemp -d)
echo "üìÅ Created temp directory: $TEMP_DIR"

# Test connectivity first
echo "üîç Testing connectivity to storage..."
curl -I "$DOWNLOAD_URL" || echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  Primary URL test failed"

# Download the release package with multiple fallbacks
echo "‚¨áÔ∏è  Downloading release package..."
DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS=false

# Try primary URL (custom domain)
echo "üì• Trying primary URL: $DOWNLOAD_URL"
if wget --no-check-certificate --timeout=30 "$DOWNLOAD_URL" -O "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" 2>/dev/null; then
    echo "‚úÖ Downloaded from primary URL"
    DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS=true
else
    echo "‚ùå Primary URL failed"
    
    # Try blob endpoint directly
    BLOB_URL="https://mscnstorage.blob.core.windows.net/\$web/releases/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
    echo "üì• Trying blob endpoint: $BLOB_URL"
    if wget --no-check-certificate --timeout=30 "$BLOB_URL" -O "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" 2>/dev/null; then
        echo "‚úÖ Downloaded from blob endpoint"
        DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS=true
    else
        echo "‚ùå Blob endpoint failed"
        
        # Try static website endpoint
        STATIC_URL="https://mscnstorage.z6.web.core.windows.net/releases/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
        echo "üì• Trying static website endpoint: $STATIC_URL"
        if wget --no-check-certificate --timeout=30 "$STATIC_URL" -O "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" 2>/dev/null; then
            echo "‚úÖ Downloaded from static website endpoint"
            DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS=true
        else
            echo "‚ùå Static website endpoint failed"
            
            # Try GitHub as final fallback
            GITHUB_URL="https://github.com/OfirGavish/Group-Tree-Membership-Visualizer/releases/latest/download/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
            echo "üì• Trying GitHub fallback: $GITHUB_URL"
            if wget --no-check-certificate --timeout=30 "$GITHUB_URL" -O "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" 2>/dev/null; then
                echo "‚úÖ Downloaded from GitHub fallback"
                DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS=true
            else
                echo "‚ùå All download attempts failed"
                DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS=false
            fi
        fi
    fi
fi

if [ "$DOWNLOAD_SUCCESS" = false ]; then
    echo "üí• FATAL: Could not download release package from any source"
    echo "Tried:"
    echo "  1. Custom domain: $DOWNLOAD_URL"
    echo "  2. Blob endpoint: https://mscnstorage.blob.core.windows.net/\$web/releases/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
    echo "  3. Static website: https://mscnstorage.z6.web.core.windows.net/releases/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
    echo "  4. GitHub releases: https://github.com/OfirGavish/Group-Tree-Membership-Visualizer/releases/latest/download/group-tree-visualizer-latest.zip"
    exit 1
fi

# Verify download
if [ ! -f "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" ] || [ ! -s "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Downloaded file is missing or empty"
    exit 1
fi

echo "‚úÖ Package downloaded successfully ($(du -h $TEMP_DIR/release.zip | cut -f1))"

# Extract the package
echo "üì¶ Extracting package..."
if ! unzip -q "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip" -d "$TEMP_DIR/extracted"; then
    echo "‚ùå Failed to extract package"
    echo "File info:"
    file "$TEMP_DIR/release.zip"
    exit 1
fi

echo "üìã Extracted contents:"
find "$TEMP_DIR/extracted" -type f | head -20

# Find the static files directory or use root if package is already extracted
STATIC_DIR="$TEMP_DIR/extracted"
if [ -d "$TEMP_DIR/extracted/static" ]; then
    STATIC_DIR="$TEMP_DIR/extracted/static"
    echo "üìÇ Found static files directory at: $STATIC_DIR"
elif [ -f "$TEMP_DIR/extracted/index.html" ]; then
    echo "üìÇ Using root extracted directory (pre-built static files)"
else
    echo "‚ùå No usable static files found in package"
    echo "Package structure:"
    find "$TEMP_DIR/extracted" -type f | head -10
    exit 1
fi

# Get deployment token
echo "üîë Getting deployment token..."
DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN=$(az staticwebapp secrets list --name "$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME" --resource-group "$RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME" --query "properties.apiKey" -o tsv)

if [ -z "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" ] || [ "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" = "null" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Failed to get deployment token"
    echo "Trying alternative method..."
    # Alternative token retrieval
    DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN=$(az rest --method post --uri "/subscriptions/$SUBSCRIPTION_ID/resourceGroups/$RESOURCE_GROUP_NAME/providers/Microsoft.Web/staticSites/$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME/listSecrets?api-version=2022-03-01" --query "properties.apiKey" -o tsv)
    
    if [ -z "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" ] || [ "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" = "null" ]; then
        echo "‚ùå Still failed to get deployment token"
        exit 1
    fi
fi

echo "‚úÖ Deployment token obtained (${#DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN} characters)"

# Install SWA CLI
echo "üì¶ Installing SWA CLI..."
if ! npm install -g @azure/static-web-apps-cli; then
    echo "‚ùå Failed to install SWA CLI"
    exit 1
fi

# Deploy the static files
echo "üöÄ Deploying to Static Web App..."
cd "$STATIC_DIR"
echo "üìÅ Deploying from: $(pwd)"
echo "üìÑ Files to deploy: $(find . -name '*.html' -o -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' | wc -l) files"

if swa deploy . --deployment-token "$DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN" --verbose; then
    echo "‚úÖ Deployment completed successfully!"
    echo "üì± Application URL: https://$STATIC_WEB_APP_NAME.azurestaticapps.net"
    echo "üîß Next step: Run MSAL configuration script"
else
    echo "‚ùå SWA deployment failed with exit code $?"
    echo "üîç Checking for common issues..."
    echo "Token length: ${#DEPLOYMENT_TOKEN}"
    echo "Working directory: $(pwd)"
    echo "Available files: $(ls -la | head -10)"
    exit 1
fi

# Cleanup
rm -rf "$TEMP_DIR"
echo "üßπ Cleaned up temporary files"
echo "üéâ Automated deployment completed!"
